heading: Today
text: Morning clouds giving way to sunshine south, with some afternoon clearing north. Highs in the 30s north, 40 to 45 south. Winds light and variable.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly clear early, then increasing clouds from the west. Patchy fog or freezing fog east. Lows in the 20s, near 20 in cold spots northeast, rising into the 30s west after midnight. Winds light, becoming south near 10 mph from the Green Mountains west.

heading: Friday
text: Patchy morning fog east. Becoming cloudy. Rain showers developing in NY, spreading east in the afternoon. Highs in the 40s, near 40 northeast. South winds near 10 mph east of the Green Mountains, increasing to 10 to 15 mph, gusting 30 to 40 mph from the Green Mountains west.
